title: Welcome to the Playground!
body: We have updated the site to load news from a file! No more editing HTML.

title: New Command Learning Lab
body: Check out the new interactive Bash lesson in the terminal. Type 'learn-commands' to start.

title: Ventoy Interactive
body: Ventoy is a usb system that allows you to copy and install mulitple OS on a single drive.

title: Linux Playground software
body: This is the full base release of the program. Remember: start with Terminal Tutor to begin the first lession.
